name: ALCHEMIC POWER RESERVE
description: When violence breaks out, the Getimian consumes reagents and creates a powerful elixir to aid her allies. Spend 1 mote. When rolling Join Battle, treat the successes as though it were a Build Power roll. The Getimian creates a dose of alchemical elixir. This potion may be given to any ally within close range as a simple action. An ally consumes it as a reflexive action and gains the built Power. This transfer may not be used on the first round.

name: FATE-UNWINDING DENIAL
description: The Getimian denies fate’s will, reshaping the outcome of events. When a target of her social influence chooses a hard bargain, the Getimian may spend 1 mote or a set of banked Stunt dice. The player determines the consequences of the bargain, with agreement from the Storyteller. If the target refuses her influence outright, the Getimian gains two additional dice above the usual. Also, gain 1 anima.

name: SPACE-AND-TIME UNDERSTANDING
description: The Getimian understands the shape of reality, and how to best take advantage of it. Whenever the character takes any move action, including sprint and rush, she may spend 1 mote to cross the distance instantly and without any trace of her passage. This does not count as her Charm use for that step. She may bypass obstacles, environmental hazards, difficult terrain, traps, and so on with this instant movement. This movement may be in any direction.

name: SUMMONED FROM TIME
description: The Getimian calls forth allies and resources from a forgotten time and place. Spend up to the Getimian’s Essence in motes. She instantly summons a Merit from her Origin, paying one mote for a tertiary Merit, two motes for a secondary Merit, or three motes for a primary Merit. It persists until the end of the session, though the character may use an Exalt milestone to purchase it permanently.

name: BENT REALITY STANCE
description: Twisting space to her will, the Getimian makes striking her disorienting and difficult. Spend 2 motes on Step 2. An enemy attacking the Getimian must be able to make two attacks in order to strike her. If they can, only one attack may apply against her. If they cannot, treat their attack as though it were part of a flurry, but increase the dice penalty by two.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: If the attack misses, steal 1 Power from the target. Gain an additional anima.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: If the attack hits, gain 2 Power. Gain an additional anima.

name: DEVIL-QUEEN’S COURT
description: The Getimian binds others to her, creating a 'court' from allies and characters with positive Intimacies. She may draw from a dice pool equal to the number of those characters. These dice don’t count toward dice limits and may be used based on Charm activation type. Each die can be used once per scene.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: Commit 2 Flowing motes. Add dice to any roll involving movement, persuasion, or Close Combat.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: Commit 2 Still motes. Add dice to any roll involving subtlety, stealth, or precision, including Ranged Combat.

name: DEVIL-QUEEN’S INTRIGUES
description: Upgrade to Devil-Queen’s Court that lets the Getimian spend Flowing or Still motes to use pool dice more flexibly. With Flowing, dice modify allies’ rolls. With Still, she gains sensory access to court members.

name: DEVIL-QUEEN’S MAJESTY
description: Further upgrade to Devil-Queen’s Court. Allows replacing the court with trivial characters, transforming them into secondary Command. Flowing mode lets her summon court members. Still mode lets her teleport to them and act.

name: DISTILLED-EMOTION ELIXIR
description: The Getimian makes a potion that causes an emotional shift. Spend 1 mote to instill an Intimacy via social influence. If successful, the Getimian bottles it into a potion to be used later.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: The Intimacy is a Tie relative to passion, fury, righteousness, or indignation.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: The Intimacy is a Principle relative to lawfulness, justice, vengeance, or order.

name: HERE-AND-EVERYWHERE APPROACH
description: Spend 2 motes to split the character across two locations for a venture. Make two different Ability rolls. Each roll is valid for the venture, but no additional Charms may enhance them.

name: FORGETTING THE LIE
description: Spend 1 mote to instill false memories as Intimacies via social influence. These are not emotional but representative of deceptive memories.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: Commit 1 more mote to make the memory contagious. Those affected can instill it into others once.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: Anchor the memory; it cannot be removed unless the Getimian wills it or magic forces it.

name: SLEEPER-GUIDING WHISPER
description: Gain extra dice on a social influence action that creates a shadow Minor Intimacy. The Getimian may later make the target forget the interaction.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: Persuade action may be taken for free if Resolve is beaten.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: Instill action may be taken for free. Target can't hard bargain. Resisting gives the Getimian bonus dice.

name: UNAVOIDABLE CONFRONTATION
description: Spend 1 mote on Step 3. When rushing, trade bonus dice to reduce an enemy’s Defense or Hardness by 2.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: Increase Overwhelming value of the attack by 1 on Step 5.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: If the attack hits, steal 1 Power from the target.

name: CULTURE-HERO USURPATION
description: The Getimian goes beyond merely rewriting another’s heart and begins to rewrite their legend. Spend 3 motes and name a target of major renown. Make an opposed Presence roll against their Integrity. If successful, the Getimian seizes her target’s presence and stature in society and consumes it. It cannot be re-invoked against the same target until the end of the story.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: Once per session, the Getimian may assert that she is responsible for something that her target did, owns something belonging to the target, or take the target’s place in a relationship. She pries that history away from her target, gaining a relevant Merit or becoming the focus of a relevant Intimacy. She may do this even if the roll fails.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: Once per session, the Getimian may name an action the target took, something that belongs to the target, or a relationship the target has with a third party. The named detail fades from memory, with only the Getimian and the target remembering it. Physical objects get lost or claimed by others who are no longer aware of who it belongs to. She may do this even if the roll fails.

name: FINDING THE CHORUS
description: The Getimian binds those closest into her personal history for but a heartbeat, letting them see her as she was meant to be. Commit 1 mote for the scene. Until the mote is uncommitted, all observers gain a temporary Minor Intimacy toward the Getimian.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: The Getimian inflames the hearts of those around her, drawing them to her comparative coolness. The Intimacy is one of love, affection, or loyalty, etc.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: The Getimian stills the world around her, making her inner fires seem to rage and burn brightly. The Intimacy is one of awe, fear, or reverence, etc.

name: ICON-OBLITERATING PASSION
description: The Getimian’s surety of self becomes a sword, wielded expertly against Heaven and all its lackeys. Spend 2 motes on Step 5. If you make a successful decisive attack against a god or elemental, you may activate this Charm for 1 mote instead. The Getimian may strike dematerialized enemies. The target must immediately materialize and cannot dematerialize for the remainder of the scene.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: If this Charm slays a god, the Getimian redefines reality within that god’s purview. All changes made with this Charm are subject to Storyteller approval and create obvious anomalies in fate.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: Sever the god from their sources of worship and power, permanently weakening them. If slain, the god fades from the memories of her worshipers, her entreaties to heaven are lost, and her temples lie cold and empty.

name: IDEOLOGY REDEFINITION TRICK
description: The Getimian reaches out and snuffs the flames of conviction in her enemies’ hearts. Commit 1 mote for the scene and choose a target the Getimian interacts with socially. The target’s Virtues cannot be used to increase the difficulty of social actions against them and cannot be applied to other effects. Only one target at a time may be affected by this Charm.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: Trying to influence the target provokes an uncontrollable anguish. Any actions they take must be flurried.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: When influenced, the target’s soul reaches for the empty place where those Virtues should be, straining the target’s health. She takes a level of damage unless she succeeds on a Fortitude + Physique or Integrity roll, difficulty equal to the Getimian’s Essence.

name: PERSPECTIVE-CONSUMING GRANDEUR
description: Tearing down the walls around the human soul, the Getimian infects her target with her own point of view. Commit 1 mote and name a target and a detail about the Getimian’s Origin — the target remembers it as if it were real for the duration. Gain additional benefits as per mode.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: Until the mote is uncommitted, the target gains a Major Intimacy toward either the Getimian or something she represents.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: Until the mote is uncommitted, replace the target’s Major Virtue with one of the Getimian’s choice.

name: REALITY EMBELLISHMENT APPROACH
description: The Getimian taps into her never-achieved greatness, refracting it into Creation. Commit 1 mote. While active, gain two bonus dice for all social influence attempts. Emotional effects vary by mode.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: The target character cannot be intimidated for the remainder of the scene.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: Name a character and make a statement about her to a third party (need not be true); by the end of the scene, everyone present will have heard it except the target.

name: THE FILIAL CHAIN
description: Spend 1 mote and choose a target present. If the target speaks against or opposes the Getimian, she may impose a shadow Intimacy of obligation on the target. While under this effect, apply additional modes.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: The Getimian may resist social influence applied by the target. If she chooses a hard bargain, the target suffers consequences instead.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: The Getimian may redirect influence targeting herself to a character with a shadow Intimacy. The target must resist or suffer damage or empower the Getimian’s next action.

name: THRONE-SMASHING AMBITION
description: The Getimian shifts reality to curse her target. On a successful decisive attack, she may instead apply a curse.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: Reverse a target’s social standing. Imposes dice penalty to social actions equal to the Getimian’s Force. Lasts until the end of the story or until the mote is uncommitted.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: Downgrade the target’s social Merit (e.g., Backing), resisted with an Embassy roll. Merit is lost until major milestone achieved.

name: WALL-DENYING FURY
description: Spend 1 mote to take a simple move action through an impassable obstacle. Cannot be flurried with an attack. Gain an additional anima. Different effects occur depending on the mode.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.effect: The obstacle detonates violently. It may become an environmental hazard dealing Force in damage, difficulty equal to Essence+2 to resist. The area becomes difficult terrain.

modes.name: Still
modes.effect: The obstacle reshapes permanently into something drawn from the Getimian’s Origin.

name: CONSTANT PROBLEM TACTIC
description: The Getimian’s presence is a never-ending curse. Spend 1 mote. Choose a target the Getimian has either successfully influenced socially or dealt at least two levels of damage to. The target must contend with the Getimian depending on the mode.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.title: Combat Pursuit
modes.effect: In a combat scene apply this as a Step 5 Charm. Whenever the target takes a move action away from the Getimian, apply this effect. The Exalt instantly moves to be within close range of the target, regardless of the distance her target traveled, even if she used her movement this turn.

modes.name: Still
modes.title: Instant Tracking
modes.effect: The Getimian may make an Awareness roll. If successful, she knows where her target is. Spend the mote, and the Exalt appears instantly in the same scene as the target. She transports only herself.

name: COURAGE-DECANTING ALCHEMY
description: The Getimian expresses her valor, giving it physical form that it might fuel the courage of others. Commit 1 mote for the scene. The Getimian creates an elixir of courage that may be imbibed by another character, or by the Getimian herself. When someone does so, they gain the effects listed below.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.title: Battle Ferocity
modes.effect: When in battle, the character gains a three-dice bonus to Close Combat rolls as long as she is pursuing or upholding an Intimacy or Virtue. If she takes any other actions, they suffer a one-die penalty.

modes.name: Still
modes.title: Steadfast Belief
modes.effect: For the purposes of calculating the character’s Resolve, treat a Minor Virtue or Intimacy as if they were Major instead, or increase the benefits of a Major Virtue or Intimacy (character’s choice) by one.

name: FOLDING SPACE
description: Collapsing space between two points, the Getimian and her cohorts arrive at their destination in a blink. Spend 2 motes. The Getimian gathers space between her current location and another destination within Creation she has previously been either in reality or in her Origin and then slingshots herself and her allies there. She may bypass up to her Essence in obstacles in a travel venture and declare an advantage from her Origin. Gain an additional anima.

name: ONE-ON-ONE IMPRISONMENT
description: The Getimian binds an enemy to herself, entrapping them in the prison of her presence. Spend 2 motes and choose one target within short range of the Exalt. This shifts reality, transporting the Getimian and her target temporarily into a bubble of reality manifested from her Origin. For two rounds in combat or for two social influence actions, the Exalt and her target can only affect and be affected by each other. No other environmental or situational bonuses, penalties, or dangers apply, and they cannot be detected or interacted with by any other character. Once this effect ends, the Getimian cannot use this Charm again until the start of the next scene. This may be used during a clash.

name: SPATIAL DISJUNCTION
description: Tearing a rift in reality, the Getimian makes approaching her impossible. Spend 1 mote. Until the start of the Getimian’s next turn, treat the space between her and an enemy as either one range band closer or further. If this would put the Getimian out of range of the attack, the target may still roll but suffers a success penalty equal to half the Getimian’s Fortitude, rounded up.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.title: Melee Step Bonus
modes.effect: This is a Step 3 Charm. If this puts the target immediately into melee range, gain three bonus dice to the attack roll.

modes.name: Still
modes.title: Power Drain
modes.effect: This is a Step 4 Charm. If the attack hits, steal 1 Power from the target.

name: TRUTH IS RELATIVE
description: The Getimian strips the blinders from others, forcing them to confront the comfortable lies they tell themselves. Commit 1 mote and touch a target. The next time the target makes a statement or acts in support of an Intimacy, this Charm’s effects activate.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.title: Boost Then Break
modes.effect: The target gains the Exalt’s Flowing motes in dice for the action, but afterward must succeed on a Fortitude + Integrity roll with a difficulty equal to the Getimian’s Force. Failure causes the Intimacy to reverse its emotional underpinnings; love becomes hate, desire becomes disgust, ambition becomes apathy, etc.

modes.name: Still
modes.title: Intimacy Collapse
modes.effect: The target loses the Exalt’s Still motes in dice from his roll and must succeed on a Fortitude + Integrity roll with difficulty equal to the Getimian’s Finesse to prevent the Intimacy from downgrading (if Major) or disappearing (if Minor).

name: UNFORGED MASTERWORKS
description: The Getimian draws on her memories of the world as it should be and pulls forth — for just a few moments — a shining exemplar of that reality. Commit 1 mote for the scene. The Getimian creates a secondary Artifact weapon, regardless of her Essence rating. This temporary weapon gains a unique inherent ability of the player and Storyteller’s design. If she cancels the committed mote and reactivates this Charm in the same scene, the same weapon appears.

modes.name: Flowing
modes.title: Extra Conversion
modes.effect: Every extra she strikes down with this weapon vanishes and reappears as the Getimian’s Origin’s version of him. Treat this as a temporary Followers Merit if the Getimian uses this Charm on multiple targets. At the end of the scene, all loyal extras created by this Charm vanish with the artifact weapon.

modes.name: Still
modes.title: Defensive Counterattack
modes.effect: When she successfully defends against a decisive attack, she may make an influence action against her opponent on Step 8, as if it were a counterattack.
